entries.name: absolute_name
entries.desc: Absolute name of this file

entries.name: classes_or_modules
entries.desc: All the classes or modules that were declared in this file. These are assigned to either #classes_hash or #modules_hash once we know what they really are.

entries.name: file_stat
entries.desc: This TopLevel's File::Stat struct

entries.name: parser
entries.desc: The parser class that processed this file

entries.name: relative_name
entries.desc: Relative name of this file

entries.name: new(absolute_name, relative_name = absolute_name)
entries.desc: Creates a new TopLevel for the file at absolute_name.  If documentation is being generated outside the source dir relative_name is relative to the source directory.

entries.name: ==(other)
entries.desc: An RDoc::TopLevel is equal to another with the same #relative_name

entries.name: add_alias(an_alias)
entries.desc: Adds an_alias to Object instead of self.

entries.name: add_constant(constant)
entries.desc: Adds constant to Object instead of self.

entries.name: add_include(include)
entries.desc: Adds include to Object instead of self.

entries.name: add_method(method)
entries.desc: Adds method to Object instead of self.

entries.name: add_to_classes_or_modules(mod)
entries.desc: Adds class or module mod. Used in the building phase by the Ruby parser.

entries.name: base_name()
entries.desc: Base name of this file

entries.name: cvs_url()
entries.desc: Returns a URL for this source file on some web repository.  Use the -W command line option to set.

entries.name: display?()
entries.desc: Only a TopLevel that contains text file) will be displayed.  See also RDoc::CodeObject#display?

entries.name: find_class_or_module(name)
entries.desc: See RDoc::TopLevel::find_class_or_module

entries.name: find_local_symbol(symbol)
entries.desc: Finds a class or module named symbol

entries.name: find_module_named(name)
entries.desc: Finds a module or class with name

entries.name: full_name()
entries.desc: Returns the relative name of this file

entries.name: hash()
entries.desc: An RDoc::TopLevel has the same hash as another with the same #relative_name

entries.name: http_url(prefix)
entries.desc: URL for this with a prefix

entries.name: last_modified()
entries.desc: Time this file was last modified, if known

entries.name: marshal_dump()
entries.desc: Dumps this TopLevel for use by ri.  See also marshal_load

entries.name: object_class()
entries.desc: Returns the NormalClass “Object”, creating it if not found.

entries.name: page_name()
entries.desc: Base name of this file without the extension

entries.name: path()
entries.desc: Path to this file for use with HTML generator output.

entries.name: search_record()
entries.desc: Search record used by RDoc::Generator::JsonIndex

entries.name: text?()
entries.desc: Is this TopLevel from a text file instead of a source code file?

entries.name: eql?(other)
entries.desc: Alias for: ==

entries.name: name()
entries.desc: Alias for: base_name
